1.content: Which of the kids will be needing bigger clothing?
1.title: Let's get started...

11.content: So we've selected this bespectacled derp. How will he pack 'em on?
11.title: John

choices: I want a different John story
113.content:
It's been nearly a week since John's birthday, and his father is still cranking out cakes as fast as he can. For the main part, John doesn't mind, or really, he can't mind, whenever he protests to a slice of cake, his dad gets this sad little look, like John is scolding him.

It's taken nearly a week, but John's finally stopped caring. Sure, cake gets tiring after a while, but it's not like his father's cakes are bad, and after a while the sugary flavors don't seem so overpowering. Plus that Gushers-cake dad had made the other day had really opened John's eyes to the wonders of cake.

Currently, John is perched at his desk, working on 'homework'; he and Dave are actually currently discussing what they're learning in history and unhonestly debating which slight variation is true. A slice of carrot cake rests on the desk beside him, a few mouthfuls missing, and John picks at it as he types.

John is precariously unaware of how little cake is left, and when he finally logs off pesterchum, hearing his father call out something about dinner being done downstairs, his fork is absently scraping across the empty plate.

Shrugging off his fullness, John climbs to his feet and calls out a "Coming!" back downstairs.
113.title: Overeating

choices: Hunt around the apartment, maybe Bro left some other snacks around.
Hold that thought, oh shit it’s Bro!
Wait... something feels off here... is this a dreambubble memory?!
I want to start a differnt Dave story
13.content:
Dave lounged on the couch in his comfy red record shirt and shades. It was a lazy Sunday, so he only wore his heart print boxers on his lower half.

He was currently preoccupied with another mind-numbing video game as he slowly consumed a large bowl of nacho chips his Bro had bought the other day. Dave was sure he was going to get yelled at for pinching it, but that was later, and Dave was hungry now.

It’s not like anything else was in the house. Bro was a cool guy and all, but he was an… interesting guardian at best. The fridge was full of shitty swords, the kitchen cupboard full of fireworks. The only food Dave got was either the things he bought for himself with his meagre allowance (which sucked because it was so small even though Dave knew Bro was damn loaded with cash from the puppet biz and other side projects) or the cheap fastfood that Bro bought occasionally for dinner.

Dave knew this pseudo starvation tactic was part of Bros larger plan, whatever the fuck that was. At least it, along with the near daily strifes he had with his Bro had kept Dave in pretty good condition. Lean but not skinny, broad shoulders, lightly toned muscles composing his makeup. Dave was good looking and he knew it.

He reached another hand into the bowl of cheesy deliciousness. But instead of his fingers finding any more nachos as expected, his sadly touched the bottom of the bowl.
A shocked Dave paused his game and looked down at his problem, he didn’t want to believe it, he had already eaten his way though the whole thing, and it had been jumbo sized.

Dave let out a weary chuckle, the reality check prompted a dawning realization of how full his belly had gotten. It was taut and noticeably bloated, if only a little.
Dave was just surprised he had eaten them so fast, he had made such a glutton out of himself, and he still kind of craved for more.

It wasn’t exactly unusual for Dave to eat voraciously, he was raised to be ravenous or he wouldn’t get any of the good food if he wasn’t fast enough when Bro brought home take out. But this had to be a new speed record for finishing a big bowl of chips Dave thought glumly. He rationalized, maybe the chip packet were more stingy these days, though his fullness didn’t agree.

Not wanting to just sit on his butt playing video games without refreshments, even if he wasn’t hungry, Dave weighted up his options.
13.title: Dave

choices: A few bags of fast food or takeout
A whole spread of Southern-fried food
131.content:
Dave's stomach answered this dilemma for him with a growl of hunger. "Alright, alright, pipe down," he told it as he climbed to his feet and stretched. "Wonder what Bro left for food... if he left anything at all," Dave added quietly as he meandered into the kitchen.

Once there, Dave found
131.title: On the prowl for munchies

1311.content:
The small table Dave and Bro shared (at least on the rare occasions their eating schedules aligned with each-other) was covered in the familiar take-out bags of fast food.

"Why am I not surprised..." Dave muttered to himself, sitting down and grabbing a bag with his name on it in sharpie. Within was a couple large burgers and cartons of fries, which actually DID surprise him, since it was more than Bro usually got for him-not that Dave's growling stomach was complaining.

Without another thought, he wolfed the contents down quickly. "Mmm... so good..." Dave muttered. "But I'm still starving, why am I so hungry?!" he said aloud as his belly gurgled again and urged him to grab the next bag with his name on it.
1311.title: The usual fare

132.content:
Dave pushes himself over to his desk, where, after plopping himself down in his seat, immediately goes off to pester someone. His list of contacts pops up, and his fingers glide over the options.

Perhaps it would be a good idea to talk to John a little. He hadn't heard from that glasses wearing derp for awhile, and a part of him worried that his father had buried his body under loads of fresh cakes. On the other hand, Rose did say her mother was trying recently to ironically make her happy, which could lead to some rather amusing hijinks and tomfoolery. Then there was Jade. Jade was always interesting.

His mouse hovered over the three names, darting to and from. Finally, he selected...
132.title: Talk to your friend online.

15.content: What about the Alpha children?
15.title: Let's try someone else...

155.content: Sure, okay, so which of the trolls would you like to start out with?
155.title: Let's try those trolls...

choices: Forget the pants, just go get breakfast
Deal with the pants, don't let them win
The pants won, move the waistband down
1551.content:
You are KARKAT FUCKING VANTAS and you do not have time for those silly choices. What nooklicker needs to choose for you how you keep managing to gain weight? None of them, that's who. Because it's a fact that no choices will change, you have gained weight. Quite a bit, actually.

At first, he'd just brushed it off as clothes shrinking in the wash, or maybe someone fucking around with him using the alchemizer. Another pair of pants that he can't manage to button up, so what? Nobody cares about any stupid wrigglerish obsessions with whether or not he can button his pants up. Least of all, himself.

But now it's the last straw. He's standing in front of the mirror, and his pants are literally cutting into his belly. Since when did he have a belly? Sure, it was just a little thing right now, a bit of a curve budging out from his torso, but that's always where it starts. Then that little bit of belly brings along some friends, and he'll never get any of his pants to fit right. And then he's no longer Karkat Vantas, he's Karkat FatAss.
Maybe he's getting ahead of himself.
1551.title: Karkat

1552.content: Fantastic choice, my dearest chalk-eating fetishists. How will our strange blind protagonist gain?
1552.title: Terezi

1553.content: How about one of these?
1553.title: Gemini or Leo?

15531.content: How shall Sollux put some meat on those bones?
15531.title: Chubby Captor

155311.content:
What's this? An overabundance of bees? Well no, but it was an overabundance of something. Mainly of his usually concave stomach, which was currently pushing at the waistband of his pants. Let's face it, the normally skinny troll had finally gained some weight. But hey, it's cool, it's not even that much.
Still, maybe he should think back to when this started, before history repeats itself.

It all started when... he can't exactly pinpoint the exact moment that Sollux Captor, resident beanpole, started becoming less of a pole. Maybe it was when he started playing this stupid rpg with Karkat (he's definitely beating him though) or maybe it was when he decided long ago that formal exercise was for chumps. Or hey, maybe it was just sweeps of sitting on his ass all day and eating junk that finally caught up with him. There's a reason for the fat nerd stereotype, and he seems to be perpetuating it.

Whatever, it's cool, he probably needed to gain a few anyways. Being that thin wasn't healthy, so this would make him normal. Or normal-ish. Same difference.

His belly growls, breaking him out of his internal monologue. Maybe he should grab something to eat. Or he could just go check the damage, since it's probably something at least one of his asshole friends would bug him about.
155311.title: Overeating

1553122.content: So... what kind of science stuff will we plump up Sollux with?
1553122.title: Techno-gain

15531221.content: Someone gonna fatten him up or does he do it to himself?
15531221.title: Zap-Fattener

155312211.content:
Sollux was typing at his computer when his stomach growled noisily. The slender Gemini troll had been feeling hungry for some time now, since the incident with the strange laser abandoned in one of the meteor's rooms an hour or so ago. He could recall accidentally activating it and getting struck by the beam with no immediate effects. Examining the device proved fruitless, as whatever identification had been on it had long since faded away to obscurity, and whatever powered the machine was dead.

He groaned in discomfort and got up from his chair. Sollux had been getting lazier than usual lately, it seemed. He didn't stop to ponder that, as his underfed stomach was demanding food-and a lot of it, judging from the amount of noise his 130-pound body was making. Without a second thought, he headed straight for the meal block, where he made
155312211.title: Lazy Lanky Bifurcator

info.brief_description: The kids and trolls of Homestuck have started to put on a few pounds...
info.description:
No one really reads these things, do they? Well, if you are, you probably want to breeze past this section, and get to the fun stuff. However, a few ground rules for everyone to keep in mind before adding stuff on...

1. Let's keep this slightly realistic. No 100 pound gains overnight or anything, but, as it is a fantasy, you shouldn't restrain yourself. Just...let's avoid John waking up one day and realizing he's immobile.
2. Let's try to avoid turning the kids into gross blobs.
3. Male? Female? Both are acceptable here.
4. You can say characters are intimate or have sex, but let's avoid any explicit sex or anything like that. These are kids, so it's kinda disturbing if you guys write stuff that's...kinda very creepy...

Other than that, go crazy.
